title: Impact of ligand fields on Kubas interaction of open copper sites in MOFs with hydrogen molecules: an electronic structural insight
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26611-26624
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03946G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Trang Thuy Nguyen, Hoan Van Tran, Linh Hoang Nguyen, Hoang Minh Nguyen, Thang Bach Phan, Toan Nguyen-The, Yoshiyuki Kawazoe
From an electronic structure perspective, we illustrate how the ligand field influences the Kubas-like orbital interactions via orbital hybridizations that optimize the Coulomb repulsion in Cu orbitals.
